span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 48, 86); font-family: Verdana;

strong.span: Governor Cuomo has extended New York State's closure of schools and non-essential businesses until May 15th. The school building will remain closed through May 15, 2020.
